cannotUseServiceWhileSuspendedHeading: You cannot use this service while the authorised agent is suspended
cannotTellUs: You cannot tell us you have verified someone's identity as <ACSP NAME> is currently suspended
moreInformation: For more information about the suspension and what to do next, check the email we sent to <ACSP NAME>'s correspondence email address.
contactUs: You can contact us using the details on the email if you need more information, or if you think there has been a mistake.
linkAuthorisedAgentAccount: Go to the authorised agent account.
